snippet.title: Best e-book readers
snippet.description: Looking for an e-book reader? You have more choices than ever before--though the number of models we

snippet.title: Jelly
snippet.description: Don't mistake it for a search engine, but Jelly delivers a fun and more personal information experience.

snippet.title: Potty-breaking youngsters love their social networks
snippet.description: Americans, who now own an average of four digital devices, are demonstrating a heightened appetite to eat up as much digital content as they can get their hands on.

snippet.title: Prevent unauthorized use of material you share on social networks
snippet.description: Anyone can send unlicensed users a takedown notice, but the only way to collect damages for a violation of your copyright on the images, videos, and other items you post is to register them with your friendly local copyright office.

snippet.title: Banjo for Android
snippet.description: For social-media butterflies who are into geotagging posts, Banjo's streamlined interface and useful location-aware tools make it worth a download.

snippet.title: Australia number one in Game of Thrones torrents
At SXSW, thousands get a Kevin Bacon number of one
snippet.description: Twenty years later, the game that shows how many connections actors have to Kevin Bacon is still strong. Bacon showed up at SXSW, perplexed as to why.

snippet.title: QuizUp
snippet.description: Whether you're playing against total strangers or your friends, QuizUp is a fun, challenging, and frequently-updated trivia game.

snippet.title: Can TV deals be winners for Twitter, networks, watchers?
snippet.description: With Comcast as its latest partner, Twitter shows it is doubling down on its TV partnership strategy. But do Twitter users want to watch TV clips, and can the deals meet the networks' goals?

snippet.title: iControl Networks acquires Piper startup Blacksumac
snippet.description: Blacksumac's $239 Piper all-in-one DIY home security system will add some variety to iControl's current software-based offerings.
